data.name: Immersed
data.description:
VR Offices! FREE app for *multiple* Virtual Screens in VR for Mac/PC/Linux (with no extra hardware) in stunning virtual worlds!
Immersed is great for solo work with multiple screens in a virtual cafe, or for collaborating with your team around even more screens and whiteboards!

immersed.com

• FOCUS on your work with MASSIVE virtual screens in stunning virtual worlds!
• COWORK with remote users in a virtual cafe!
• COLLABORATE with your team by multi-screen sharing or whiteboarding like in person!

NOTE: For best quality/latency, use WiFi Direct: immersed.com/wifi-direct

changelog.change_log:
Add support for Freezing streaks and using power ups from Profile Menu.
Backend change for handling public rooms.

Slightly increase default menu size.
Handle issues when snapgrid and VR cursor wouldn't initialize correctly.
Minor performance improvements.
Menu copy updates.

* Bug fixes around screens and snap grid.
* Add Quest3 controller models
* Handle case when Full Body ReadyPlayerMe avatars are used, default to Immersed coin.
* Localization fixes in friend menu
* Log upload is now a manual process in Help menu
Bug fixes and improvements around screen connectivity.

Update saving and loading of Voice Volume.
Add custom DND voice volume setting in Audio Settings.
Toggling Mixed Reality mode will now show and hide the platform in the new 360 Photo environments.

Screens now layer based on distance to you.
Fix instance where leaving a room would get stuck.

UI fixes on popups and menu tooltips.
Fix LinkedIn video prompt.
Update to default poses for avatars when far away.
Update public room prompt.

Update seating and room logic to improve repositioning when entering a collaboration or public room.
Add scrolling to public room menu.

Improvements to hand ray cast when typing.
Fix UI for 360 photos. Add support for new 360 environments.

Fix lip sync for Quest 3 Meta Avatars.
Improve misfiring of raycast from hands when typing.
Increase webcam resolution on Quest 3.
Bug fixes and improvements.

Update profile UI for Pro mode.
Support Japanese and Chinese localization in App Preferences menu.
Update whiteboard to now set up as a flat surface and support drawing with bottoms of controllers.

Improve seat stacking when joining a collaboration or public room.
Fix bug with disappearing raycast.
Bug fix for resize arrow when hiding screens.
Update sizing for screen handles.
Improve latency metrics and hide latency when unable to get correct readings.
Bug fixes for collaboration timeouts.

Fix passthrough misfiring in collaboration spaces.
Fix timeouts in collaboration rooms to properly clean up idle users.
Improve accuracy of latency metrics for wireless connections.
Update Meta SDK.
UI fixes.

New update for supporting streaks when using Immersed.
UI updates and bug fixes.
Fixes around USB connection.

Improve security for local and remote streaming
Fix bugs with screen sharing not working when joining from another room
Fix floating cursor when changing seats
Support shared spatial anchors for the whiteboard
Show environment download prompt when moving to a scene that has not been downloaded

Reduce misfires with quick action menu when using hands.
Fix saving of brightness setting.
Improve hearing others when spatial audio set to lowest.
Fix verbose logging with Diagnostic Mode toggle.
Other bug fixes and optimizations.

Remove desk dependency for whiteboard.
Fix RPM editor view.
Fix some UI bugs.

Fixes to lighting in environments and Meta avatars.
Fix UI issue with monitor resolutions menu.
Bug fixes for DND button.
Fix pagination on available computers view.
Bug fixes for resize handles and mixed reality button on quick menu. Update UI in My Room menu. Environment performance optimizations.
